Smart Hairbrush: A hairbrush with built-in sensors and AI technology that can detect and analyze various aspects of your hair, such as split ends, dryness, and damage. It can also provide personalized recommendations for hair care and styling based on your specific hair type and needs.

Hairbrush with LED Light: A hairbrush with an LED light built into the handle that can be used to highlight specific areas of your hair while styling. This can be especially useful for people with dark hair who struggle to see their roots or for creating highlights and lowlights.

Interactive Hairbrush: A hairbrush that responds to voice commands, allowing you to style your hair hands-free. For example, you could say "brush my hair" and the brush would start moving on its own, smoothing out tangles and adding volume.

Hairbrush with Built-In Heating: A hairbrush with a heating element built into the handle that can be used to style and add volume to your hair. This can be especially useful for people with fine or limp hair that needs extra heat to hold a style.

Hairbrush with Sensory Feedback: A hairbrush that provides sensory feedback to help you style your hair more effectively. For example, the brush could vibrate or make a sound when you're using too much pressure, or when you're brushing in the wrong direction. This can help you develop better brushing habits and achieve a more polished look.
